select
,
from LAB_INFO where LABNAME = #{labname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LABSEQNO >1370

select
,
from LAB_INFO where LABSEQNO >1370 ORDER BY LABSEQNO

select
,
from LAB_INFO where LABNAME = #{labname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY LABSEQNO DESC

select
,
from LAB_INFO where MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY LABSEQNO DESC

= #{orderbykcw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVELOFLABREMARK = #{leveloflabremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERBYTYPE = #{orderbytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODEMPOL = #{prodempol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABINFOSTATE = #{labinfostate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELYONDEP = #{relyondep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISTEMPORARY = #{istemporary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISFULL = #{isfull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LABSEQNO = #{labseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(LABSEQNO),0)+1 from LAB_INFO
insert into LAB_INFO
